snippet.title: Giant Cop: Justice Above All Trailer 2016
snippet.description:
Giant Cop is a 70s styled, open world, narrative driven game designed for VR. You ARE Giant Cop! It's your first day on the job and you need to hit the ground running in order to keep the citizens of Micro City safe. The city is full of colourful characters who all need your help! There are plenty of arrests to make and crimes to solve, but stay frosty because everyone has their own agenda. Use your size to your advantage as you tower high above the city's streets enforcing the law, and use your wits to uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of Micro City!

Coming to Oculus Rift + Touch, 2017!

Visit our website:
http://giantcop.com/

Follow us on Social Media:
https://twitter.com/Giantcop
https://www.facebook.com/GiantCop
https://www.instagram.com/giant_cop/
